Company Description by the company:
At IMS, our overriding goal is the same as it was when we opened our doors in 1949  to provide you with the best possible molding equipment and supplies at attractive prices, and to assure you the most satisfying purchasing experience in the industry. To do that, we know we have to excel in every aspect of our business. And we are working hard to do that. From our commitment to ISO 9001:2008 quality standards to our experienced engineering and technical support staff, to our ResQSM fast delivery service, we've invested in the future of our business and yours. 

For more than 60 years, we've helped provide our customers with innovative solutions to all types of plastics processing problems, and we've developed customized equipment to help give our customers the edge in their markets. You can tap that knowledge whenever you need it, simply by asking.

When you buy from us, you should expect to be pleasantly surprised, each and every time.

Company Description by the company:
Experience

Since 1977, Scott Equipment has been dedicated to the distribution of high quality, technically advanced and energy efficient products for the industrial market. We have over 300 years of machine automation experience employed today.

Customer service is not just a department.

Our entire organization is aligned around one mission, to provide the best customer service possible.

We work with more than a part number.

We work to assist you in specifying the best component, assembly or kit for your application. If a standard product doesn't exist to meet your needs, we will work to develop a custom solution to meet your specific application.

Flexibility

As we strive to offer the best customer service possible, our flexibility can be one of our greatest assets. Need something special, something different, special labels or want to order by your part number? Ask us, and we will do our best to accommodate your request.

Company Description by the company: At RG Industries, a leading electrical products company worldwide, we pride ourselves in the service our customers have come to expect for over 30 years. We carry all major brands of circuit breakers including but not limited to: Cutler Hammer, General Electric, Square D, and Siemens. Having expanded our product lines, we also offer: breaker accessories, motor controls, buckets (feeder/combination), starters, switches, molded case circuit breakers, safety switches, fusible panel board switches, insulated case breakers, air circuit breakers, buss duct plugs, switch boards/ panel boards, and mounting hardware kits. Company Description by Thomasnet: Manufacturer of control equipment and measuring instruments. Company Description by the company:
At the close of World War I, Albert A. Weiss Jr. joined his father in the manufacturing of glass thermometers for industrial use. The factory was moved from the original shop on Chambers Street in Manhattan to a converted carriage house on Vanderbilt Avenue in Brooklyn. Business increased greatly due to an expanded product line, including pressure and temperature measuring instruments and controls for all types of industrial applications

Just as it was in 1882, for over 100 years the Weiss name has been synonymous with quality and reliability. Whether you require instruments for temperature, humidity or pressure monitoring, the Weiss line offers a full range of outstanding products from which to choose. We are committed to quality and responsive service, factors so necessary in todays business climate.

Company Description by Thomasnet: Veteran owned distributor of instrumentation. Products include valves, sanitary instrumentation, sensors, chart recorder supplies, wire and cable. Fittings, adapters, laser marking and engraving equipment, filter housings, filtration systems, sight glasses, indicators, liquid level gages, oil/water monitors and RTDs are offered. Sensors including liquid and gas flowmeters, capacitance level instrumentation, leak and presence/absence detectors, thermocouple and RTD probes, transducers, pressure transmitters and load cells; and chart recorder supplies such as circular, fan fold and roll charts, pens and inking ribbons are available. Back-up support and training services are also offered. Industries served include aerospace, government, educational, commercial, military, manufacturing, pharmaceutical, research and development labs, universities, petrochemical and gas.
Company Description by the company:
Our Mission is to provide customers in the aerospace, government, educational, industrial, and commercial instrument field with quality instrumentation and service. Our services also include back-up support and training utilizing factory personnel wherever possible. It is our belief that superior customer service is the key to follow-on business.

Who We Are

Dahl-Vaughn, Inc. was founded and incorporated on January 1, 1997 as a California Corporation by Dick Vaughn. Prior to that date, the corporation was known for over 30 years as Dale-Dahl Associates - Southern, Inc. and run by its' previous owner, Fred Dahl. Originally, all of the Principals that Dale-Dahl - Southern had were acquired by Dahl-Vaughn. Since that time, several changes have been made to expand and enhance our product offering. Fred Dahl passed away on 3/22/15. His wisdom and guidance will remain a cornerstone in the operation of our company. We cover Southern California for all of our Principals and for selected Principals More... in the 9-western states (AZ, CA, ID, MT, NV, OR, UT, WA, and WY) plus Hawaii and Alaska. Our customer base consists of the following areas: aerospace, military, manufacturing, pharmaceutical, R&D labs, universities, petrochemical and gas industries. Less

Company Description by Thomasnet: Manufacturer & distributor of abrasives including slag abrasives, mineral based abrasives, metal based abrasives & agricultural abrasives. Blast cleaning abrasives include brown aluminum oxide, Barshot™, coal slag, corn cobs, crushed glass, chilled iron grit, copper slag, glass bead, plastic media, garnet & walnut shells. Foundry products include foundry sands, green sand additives (bentonite, carbobond & carsins), resin coated sands, alphaset, betaset, riser sleeves, fluxes & metal filters, chromite, zircon & zircore, olivine, silica sand & crucibles. Waterjet cutting products include galaxy garnet, beach garnet, river garnet, SXB/SXR garnet & IG garnet. Blast cleaning equipment including blast machines, couplings & nozzle holders, nozzles, pipe cleaning equipment & blast cabinets also available. Capabilities include recycling of inorganic materials including foundry sands & slags, dust collector fines, spent abrasives, fly ash, minerals, refractory, alumina, spent lime, gypsum, mill scale & filter cakes. Industries served include foundry, steel, marine/bridge cleaning, golf, construction & water filtration.

Company Description by the company:
At General Equipment and Supply, we are dedicated to get you the right tools for the right price! We have a verity of equipment available, ranging from common hand tools to heavy machinery. We offer items new, used, or reconditioned. Inquire us today, for all your construction needs!

Sales - Technical Sales Engineers are face-to-face at your site/company when you need us, with application expertise and advice.

Repairs Our staff is knowledgeable and has experience with most tools and equipment. Let us repair your items to save you even more!

Refurbish / Reconditioning  Already have the equipment you need but its not in the best shape? Not a problem! We have our own In-House Fabrication center, where we can Refurbish or Recondition items. 

Find  Cant find the equipment youre looking for? Let us look for you! We will perform as an extension of your purchasing department for hard-to-find equipment and tools.

Rentals - Not really in the market for equipment, but still need it for a job? More... No problem! If we sell it, we will rent it.

 Refurbishment Process:

 	Extensive Electrical and Mechanical Inspection/ Rebuild

 	In-House Fabrication, including your custom refurbishment products

 	Sandblast and paint process

 	Equipment test process

 Customer Benefits:

 	Huge Cost Saving  manage a tight budget or lump sum jobs with prices 40-60% of new list.

 	Most equipment has a one-year parts / labor warranty 

 	No questions return policy

 	Flexible to your needs and responsive to your requirements

 	We are an Authorized Repair Center for Greenlee and Ridgid;

 	We are Distributors for Milwaukee, Greenlee and Ridgid. Less

Company Description by Thomasnet: Distributor of valves, gages, regulators, pumps and controls. Types include liquid level and pressure gages, safety relief, ball, butterfly, gate, globe, check and steam valves and pressure and pressure motive pumps. Various other products include thermometers, transmitters, thermowells, steam traps, flowmeters, heat exchangers, actuators and filters. Company Description by the company:
* California State Certified Small Business 

* Certified Federal Government 8(a) supplier

We maintain close relationships with many manufacturers. These relationships, coupled with our technical expertise, ensure you get the right product for the right price. The following is a sampling of products that we supply:

- Valves

- Pneumatic and electric actuators

- Steam traps

- Pressure regulators

- Heat exchangers

- Bi-metal thermometers

- Pressure gauges

- Boilers and boiler products

- Pumps

- Steam products

- Flow meters

- And much more

Our sales consultants have over 20 years of experience in the industrial process industry. When you purchase products from us, we are able to assist with specification, engineering and custom modifications. We are also able to automate new and existing valves on site or in our shop.

Contact us today!

Company Description by the company: MilesTek principally serves the military avionics, telemetry and industrial markets as well as various government agencies. Their product offering, used primarily in military, R&D and production applications, consists of a comprehensive line of MIL-STD-1553B data bus couplers, custom harnesses and cable assemblies, connectors and connector termination systems as well as a broad range of related accessories. MilesTek also offers expertise in manufacturing custom cable assemblies and harnesses and has one of the largest inventories of Cinch Trompeter products in the world. MilesTek's quality management system has been assessed and registered by Intertek as conforming to the requirements of AS9100:2009 and ISO 9001:2008.

Company Description by the company:
Turning innovation into value

Since 1969, Electro-Matic has helped transform American industry by supplying automation components and solutions to leading U. S. manufacturers. Today, Electro-Matic continues to leverage the value of emerging technologies by developing practical applications for industrial, commercial and retail markets. As a technology company, we help our customers turn innovation into value. As a one-hundred percent employee-owned business, our customers enjoy the benefit of a supplier partner intently focused on delivering strong value-for-value relationships.

While our technologies have changed over the years, our core values of customer driven service and quality have not. As an ISO Q9001-2008 Company, we are committed to engineering solutions for the most demanding of applications.

Company Description by the company: Pacific IC supplies electronic and electromechanical type products including interconnect and hardware products used at the board-level; for cabling; and also in electronic or industrial enclosures. We supply DIN Rail mounted power entry modules and power supplies as well as circuit protection and terminal blocks that are used in the Electrical and Industrial Automation industry. We also support the Industrial Automation industry with control, sensing & measurement products including Air, Fluid and Temperature Detection & Monitoring products. The Commercial and Military Electronics market segments are supplied with products including Antennas for integrated applications, Batteries, DC Cooling Fans, Frequency Control products, LEDs and Lighting, Attenuation and Microwave products, Standard and Custom Heat Sinks, Custom Metal Injection Molding, Switches and Knobs, Gas and Mechanical Springs; and Surface Mount products including Resistors.

Company Description by the company:
Integrating universal robots 6-axis collaborative robots into manufacturing systems has never been easier. Automation Distribution will design your universal robots system, which may be used without safety guarding, thereby reducing the footprint required and creating a safer environment for employees.

Applications: Pick and place, injection moulding, CNC, packaging and palletizing, quality inspection, assembly, polishing, machine tending, screw driving, lab analysis and testing, gluing, dispensing and welding, and more.

Industries: Automotive and subcontractors, food and agriculture, furniture and equipment, electronics and technology, metal and machining, plastics and polymers, pharma and chemistry, scientific and research, and more.

Case studies about universal robots robotic systems on our blog.
